odditycentral.com/2015/05/medieval-fight.snippet: While Mixed Martial Arts (MMA) matches generally incorporate striking and grappling techniques from a variety of other combat sports and martial arts, the use of medieval fighting techniques is unheard of. Until now, that is.

mmafighting.com/2015/03/tyrone-spong-kno.snippet: Tyrone Spong, the three-combat sport star, made his return to competition Friday and, well, it didn't last very long. In his pro boxing debut, Spong knocked out Gabor Farkas in the first round of an EC Boxing Germany event.
